title: Executive Order 10715-Revoking Executive Order No. 9775 of September 3, 1946
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States, Executive Order No. 9775 of September 3, 1946, entitled, "Establishing the Federal Committee on Highway Safety," is hereby revoked.
citation: Dwight D. Eisenhower, Executive Order 10715-Revoking Executive Order No. 9775 of September 3, 1946 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/306757
